channel.title: I'm planning to get SNAKEMAN
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "I'm planning to get SNAKEMAN"

item.title: Re: I'm planning to get SNAKEMAN
item.content:encoded: Assuming server time, I'll probably be able to let you back in around 9. I should be awake around then and I can check in.

item.title: Re: I'm planning to get SNAKEMAN
item.content:encoded: Cool, I'm planning to get him around 7-8 am tomorrow then.

item.title: Re: I'm planning to get SNAKEMAN
item.content:encoded: Yep, that's all there is to it. You can get back in without much effort, there's no 2 day waiting period. Just make sure you've got 3 level 2 allies.

item.title: I'm planning to get SNAKEMAN
item.content:encoded:
Sometime tomorrow (4-9-08) I'm planning to leave the village for a bit to get SNAKEMAN.

Now my understanding of how this works is this: I leave the village, then get SNAKEMAN, and finally reapply and am instantly re-accepted. Should take a few minutes at most.

Is this correct? I just want to double-check before I do something stupid and get myself kicked out several days, and to give everyone a head's up about it so they don't think I'm abandoning the village (so don't send the hunter-nins after me!).
